name: 10 Inch Table Saw, Portable Benchtop Table Saw, Stand & Push Stick, Adjustable Blade Height, With Port for Connecting Dust Collector, 90°Cross Cut & 0-45°Bevel Cut, 5000RPM
short_description: Easy Cleanup: Our table saw stand is designed with port for connecting dust collector at the back, which can help create a cleaner working environment. And it is also designed with storage part at the left and right sides for storing wrenches and push stick when they are not in use.

Safety Design: The table saw 10 inch with stand has a transparent blade guard which can provide a clear view and prevent hurt due to accidental touch. And it also comes with a push stick to enhance security during operation. Furthermore, On-off switch and overload protection are equipped for added safety.

Bevel and Height Adjustment: The blade height can be adjusted to meet your specific cutting needs with hand wheel. This craftsman table saw has a rack and pinion bevel control that provides 90°cross cutting and 0-45°bevel cutting, fast smooth, and accurate cuts.

Excellent cutting performance: Portable table saw features with high-quality 15 Amp motor, which can achieve 5000 RPM cutting performance, easy to cut all kinds of hardwood. And triangle supports at the back of the metal stand improves the stability of the table saw. Besides, extensions on both sides of the table top also allows it to handle a larger piece of wood more stably.
Package List: 10inch Table Saw, 10-Inch 24-Tooth Carbide Tipped Blade, Blade Guard, Metal Stand, Push Stick, Wrenches, Rip Fence and Miter Gauge Assembly manual.

name: Universal Miter Saw Stand with Grid Tabletop 300 lbs Load Capacity 6-Level Height Adjustment Table Saw Stand WK-MS046
short_description: ONE STAND FITS ALL: WORKESS compound miter saw stand features a 18” x 23.6” grid tabletop for perfect saw mounting. No need for multiple stands—this one does it all. Ideal for diverse workshop setups.
6-LEVEL HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: Mitre saw stand can adjust height between 6 levels (23.4" to 32.2") to find the perfect height for any project, ensuring maximum comfort and precision.

HEAVY-DUTY CAPACITY: Sturdy iron frame makes chop saw stand hold up to 300 lbs and handle large projects with ease whether you’re cutting lumber or metal, offering you the super stability to tackle any task.
START ANYWHERE, ANYTIME: The quick-fold design and carrying handle make portable miter saw stand easy to store and transport, whether moving around your garage or to a job site.

ROLLER & END STOPS: Miter saw table is equipped with 67-4/5" max sliding rollers and the end stop allows you to fix and work on longer pieces with ease, giving you the flexibility to handle larger projects without hassle.

name: 10-Inch Portable Table Saw with Stand - 15 Amp Motor, 25 Inch Rip Capacity, High-Power Jobsite & Workshop Table Saw
short_description: 15 Amp High-Power Motor - Effortlessly cuts through hardwood, softwood, and other materials with precision
25 Inch Rip Capacity - Handles large materials with ease, perfect for professional jobsites and DIY projects
Portable & Sturdy Stand - Includes a foldable stand for easy transport and storage, ideal for on-the-go use
Enhanced Safety Features - Equipped with a blade guard and anti-kickback mechanism for secure operation
Durable & Reliable - Built with heavy-duty materials for long-lasting performance in demanding environments
User-Friendly Operation: Easy to set up and break down, with intuitive controls for seamless operation. The built-in safety features protect users during cutting.

name: Table Saw, 10 Inch 15A Multifunctional Saw With Stand & Push Stick, 90° Cross Cut & 0-45° Bevel Cut, 5000RPM, Adjustable Blade Height for Woodworking, Grey
short_description: [BEVEL ANGLE and HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT] The blade height can be adjusted to meet your specific cutting needs with hand wheel. This table saw has a rack and pinion bevel control that provides 90°cross cutting and 0-45°bevel cutting.

[REMARKABLE CUTTING PERFORMANCE] Our portable table saw features with high-quality 15 Amp motor, which can achieve 5000 RPM cutting performance, easy to cut all kinds of hardwood. Besides, extensions on both sides of the table top also allows it to handle a larger piece of wood more stably.

name: WEN Multi-Purpose Rolling Planer and Miter Saw Tool Stand with Extension Rollers (MSA658T)
short_description: Adjustable rollers expand up to 54.3 inches for additional workpiece support
Metal top provides a reusable work surface that requires no drilling unlike MDF alternatives
Retractable swivel caster quickly turns the stand from stationary to mobile
Compatible with the majority of saws and planers on the market
Designed to support any WEN Benchtop Planer or Miter Saw
product_description: Remember when you could easily store and move your thickness planer around the shop? It’s time to give your benchtop tools the support they deserve with the WEN Planer and Miter Saw Stand. Our unique design includes retractable extension rollers, providing your workpieces extra support during both planing and sawing. Featuring an onboard storage shelf and a retractable swivel caster, you’ll be able to quickly go from stationary to mobile. Step on the easy-to-reach foot pedal to engage the wheels for easy transportation around your shop. The 22.7 by 22.7-inch tabletop handles up to 220 pounds of weight load while the lower storage shelf holds up to 55 pounds. The tabletop’s versatile mounting slots allow for compatibility with the entire WEN Planer and Miter Saw series, as well as the majority of other planers and miter saws on the market. But this stand isn’t limited only to saws and planers; it’s also the perfect companion for jointers, sanders, grinders, and more. And because it’s a WEN product, your planer stand comes backed by a stocked inventory of replacement parts, a friendly customer help line and a two-year warranty. Remember when you had the support you needed? Remember WEN.

name: DEWALT Portable Table Saw with Stand, 8-1/4 inch, up to 48-Degree Angle Cuts (DWE7485WS)
short_description: 24.5 in. of rip capacity for ripping 4x8 plywood or OSB sheets
Blade Brake
Compact size for easy transportation and storage
Power-Loss reset prevents accidental re-starts following a power disruption when the tool is left in the on position
Rack and pinion telescoping fence rails make fence adjustments fast, smooth and accurate
product_description: Maximized for accuracy and capacity this 8-1/4 in. Table Saw with Stand also includes on-board storage for blade gaurd assembly, non-through cut riving knife, anti-kickback pawls, blade change wrenches, miter gauge and push stick. The powerful 15 amp, 5800 RPM motor alows users to complete a mjority of applications. The rack & pinion fence allow for fast, easy adjustments and provides the capacity to rip 4x8 sheet goods.

name: Shop Fox D2275 Tool Stand
short_description: Non-slip rubber feet to dampen vibration
Convenient 24-inch working height
Generously sized top area
1,000 pound capacity
One-year warranty
product_description: This sturdy universal tool stand measures 24-Inch tall, 27-1/2 by 31-1/2-Inch at the base and 17-3/4 by 22-Inch at the top. Includes non-slip rubber'. 1,000-Pound capacity.

name: DEWALT Miter Saw Stand With Wheels (DWX726), Yellow
short_description: Easily adjustable mounting rails adapt to nearly any miter saw
Wide rubber grip wheels provide easy jobsite mobility
Three-position pneumatic assisted raising and lowering for the ultimate in flexibility and ease of set up
Durable tubular steel construction allows for a 300 lb. maximum weight capacity
Compact vertical storage option maximizes workplace efficiency and ease of transport
Straightforward one-time assembly minimizes down time
product_description: The DWX726 Rolling Miter Saw Stand is a convenient solution to transporting a saw between jobsites. Constructed of steel for durability providing 300 lb capacity. One-time assembly and pneumatic assisted raising and lowering for quick and easy set up. Wide adjustable work supports provide up to 8' of material support. Mounting rail adapts to nearly any miter saw.

name: DEWALT 10-Inch Table Saw with Rolling Stand, 32-1/2-Inch Rip Capacity (DWE7491RS)
short_description: Rack & Pinion Telescoping Fence System Make fence adjustments fast, smooth and accurate
Patented material support, can be used for narrow rip cuts.
32-1/2" rip capacity easily cuts a variety of larger shelving and trim materials
Onboard storage system provides easy access to the Blade Guard Assembly, fence, riving knife, miter gauge, wrenches, push stick, and cord wrap when not in use.
Rolling stand designed for easy set up and breakdown with excellent stability
Telescoping fence rails retract to create a small, portable package
Flip over ripping fence allows for narrow rip cuts
15 amp Motor quickly rips through hardwoods with ease
2-1/2" Dust Collection Port easily connects to a vacuum for efficient dust extraction
3-1/8" depth-of-cut at 90 and 2-1/4" at 45
product_description: The DWE7491RS 10" Jobsite Table Saw 32 - 1/2" Rip Capacity, and a Rolling Stand has a 15 Amp motor and 32-1/2" rip capacity to allow cutting of large and hardwood materials. Features tool-free guarding component adjustments and fast, accurate fence adjustments. Rolling stand designed for easy set up and breakdown with excellent stability.

name: DEWALT DWE74911 Rolling Table Saw Stand
short_description: Durable steel construction
Easy setup and break down with excellent stability
Designed for easy loading and unloading into and out of vehicle
product_description: The DEWALT DWE74911 Rolling Table Saw Stand is designed for easy setup and break down with excellent stability. This stand is lightweight for enhanced mobility and portability. It features durable steel construction, and is designed for easy loading and unloading into and out of vehicle. Can be used with DWE7490X, DWE7491RS, DWE7499GD, DWE7480 and DW745.
